post:
Makdos Technologies specializes in providing high quality non-shared, reseller & web hosting, VPS and dedicated server solutions in Turkey. All shared & reseller hosting plans feature CloudLinux hosting environments, HP 3PAR Storage System, LiteSpeed web server, redundant backups & more!


Our cloud infrastructure is one of Turkey's most powerful hardware infrastructures and consists of the best server, storage, network and ancillary equipment for our customers to get the best performance from their cloud servers.
Server Hardware: Our VPS servers feature different configs, we use HP 3PAR Enterprise Storage System, Dual Xeon X5690/5680 and Dual 2620v4/2640v4 processors, Dual 10Gbps network connections & fully owned hardware maintained & built by us in-house.

Devoted Resources
All virtual servers have exclusive resources to access 100% capacity.
=========================================================

Included with ALL CLOUD Plans:

  • Guaranteed Resources. None of your specified resources are shared!
  • HP 3PAR Enterprise Storage System
  • Dual Intel Xeon processors
  • Unrestricted Root Acces
  • Fast Installation
  • Free 3 Rebuilds / Month

Free Extra Installations:

  • Plesk Onyx
  • Cpanel
  • Maestropanel
  • Centos Web Panel
  • MSSQL Express
  • Vesta Control Panel

View Cloud Hosting Plans



About Our Company
Our company was established in Istanbul in 2014 in order to offer Individual and Corporal Internet Services. Since the day it was founded, it has aimed to offer uninterrupted, fast and reliable internet services to its customers and to complete customer satisfaction.
Our services include Domain Registration, Hosting, E-Mail Services, Virtual Server Services (VPS), Dedicated Server Services, Teamspeak, Security Software (SSL Licenses), Streaming Services (Live Broadcast) and Backup Services.

SSD Infrastructure Power
With the Makdos virtual servers, SSD performance is waiting for you with sufficient storage space and high I / O without paying additional fees and fully automatic. We configure our HP 3PAR platform for the highest performance and present it to you at the service of our customers.

Full Administration Access
By using a virtual server you not only have hardware performance, but you also have root or administrative access on your server. On this page, you can install any system you need, whether it's single programs, script languages, databases, or game servers. You can personalize your server by managing it as you like.


View Cloud Hosting Plans


Questions? Send us an email at info@makdos.com or contact live chat at right bottom of the page here: https://www.makdos.us/
